SQL Server 2008 R2 (x64)
WorkItem.Summary: The add-in InternalsViewer.SSMSAddIn.Connect failed to load or caused an exception

Comments.Message: There seem to a number of references to this error with other add-ins following an upgrade to SQL Server 2008 R2 (e.g. http://www.red-gate.com/messageboard/viewtopic.php?t=9427), requiring the add-in to be updated. Is this likely to be the case for InternalsViewer?

I got the same error message since upgraded my client tools. I downloaded a copy of the source and now working on the updated version. It would be great if the project owner may release a new version for 2012 and 2008 R2 :)

I've had the same problem - has anyone found a way around this yet?

Cheers.
